item.title: By: Paul Prendergast
item.dc:creator: Paul Prendergast
item.description: Hi Conor, Thanks for the mention. We are pretty excited about the applications and would appreciate testers feedback. Nasty patent lawyers are keeping me quiet at the moment ..not for long though. Drop over to the blog as mentioned or email me at paul@yougetitback.com if you would be interested in beta testing.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Conor,
Thanks for the mention. We are pretty excited about the applications and would appreciate testers feedback. Nasty patent lawyers are keeping me quiet at the moment ..not for long though.
Drop over to the blog as mentioned or email me at paul@yougetitback.com if you would be interested in beta testing.
